text: Sinna, kunwi d wid immin$en, tessuff$em arbaa segwen, seg ixxamen nnsen. Tezzim asen s ibekkaven akked taadawt. Ma usan kwen id, d imeebas, tfeddum ten. Irna, ipwagdel awen usuffe$ nnsen. Day tumnem deg ueric n Tezmamt, tnekoem wayev? Anwa ay d arraz n wid, segwen, ixedmen aya, ma macci d ddell, di tmeddurt n ddunit, u, ass n tnekra, ad ppunefken i uaaqeb uqsie mavi? Ur I$fil Oebbi $ef wayen txeddmem
